landing.heroSubtitle: A free Ramadan companion for Muslims worldwide. Track daily ibadah, get accurate prayer times, read the Holy Quran, and plan your goals — all in Bengali and English.
landing.whyDesc: Every Ramadan, we struggle to stay consistent. This app is built to help you set goals, track progress, and make the most of every blessed day — whether you are in Dhaka or Dubai.
landing.featureTrackingDesc: Track salah (5 waqt + Taraweeh + Tahajjud), Quran recitation (Para/Surah/Ayah), daily dhikr, istighfar, charity, and good deeds with a simple tap.
landing.featurePrayerDesc: Get Sehri, Iftar, and all 5 prayer times for any city worldwide — powered by the AlAdhan API with Hanafi calculation.
landing.featureQuranDesc: Access all 114 Surahs with Arabic text and translations. Set daily recitation goals and track your progress through Ramadan.
landing.featureGoalsDesc: Set personal targets — finish the Quran, give daily charity, pray Tahajjud every night. Track your streak and stay motivated.
landing.featureRemindersDesc: Never miss Sehri or Iftar. Get timely reminders for prayers, Quran reading, and your custom goals.
landing.featureCalendarDesc: Sync Ramadan schedule with Google Calendar and Apple Calendar so you never miss a beat.
landing.featureBilingualDesc: Full support for Bengali (বাংলা) as the primary language, with English for expats. Switch anytime with one tap.
landing.featurePrivacyDesc: Your ibadah data is private. We use row-level security and never share your information.
landing.prayerTimesDesc: Accurate Sehri, Iftar, and all 5 Waqt prayer times for your location
landing.ramadanTimingsDesc: Full month Sehri & Iftar schedule for your city
landing.quranDesc: Read all 114 Surahs with Arabic text. Set daily recitation goals and track your journey through the entire Quran.
landing.step1Desc: Explore all features — prayer times, Quran, trackers — without signing up.
landing.step2Desc: Mark your salah, log Quran pages, check off daily good deeds.
landing.step3Desc: Create a free account to save progress across devices and set reminders.
landing.ctaDesc: Join thousands of Muslims planning a meaningful Ramadan. It's completely free.
landing.footerTagline: Built with love for the Ummah

prompt.title: Save Your Progress
prompt.description: Create a free account to keep your salah, Quran, and daily tracking data saved across all your devices.
